distribution_metadata.name: distribution_id
distribution_metadata.description: distribution unique identifier

distribution_metadata.name: default_type
distribution_metadata.description: default Python (numpy) datatype

distribution_metadata.name: default_value
distribution_metadata.description: default distribution value

distribution_metadata.name: use_default_value_on_unsafe_cast
distribution_metadata.description: if true, replace failed casts with default value

distribution_metadata.name: is_online
distribution_metadata.description: indicator for online distribution

distribution_metadata.name: warn_on_online_support_change
distribution_metadata.description: if true and support changes between online updates, raise warning

distribution_metadata.name: is_discrete
distribution_metadata.description: indicator for discrete distribution

distribution_metadata.name: custom_discrete_support
distribution_metadata.description: comma-delimited support

distribution_metadata.name: support_maximum
distribution_metadata.description: support maximum value

distribution_metadata.name: support_minimum
distribution_metadata.description: support minimum value

distribution_metadata.name: remove_support_violators
distribution_metadata.description: if true, exclude values from unspecified support

distribution_metadata.name: is_nullable
distribution_metadata.description: column nullability

distribution_metadata.name: track_moments
distribution_metadata.description: if true, dynamically calculate moment estimates for distribution

distribution_metadata.name: n_moments
distribution_metadata.description: number of moments to dynamically track (starting at n=1)

distribution_metadata.name: n_central_moments
distribution_metadata.description: number of central moments to dynamically track (starting at n=2)

distribution_metadata.name: n_standardized_moments
distribution_metadata.description: number of moments to dynamically track (starting at n=3)

distribution_metadata.name: track_quantiles
distribution_metadata.description: if true, dynamically track quantile estimates for distribution

distribution_metadata.name: n_quantiles
distribution_metadata.description: number of evenly-spaced quantiles to specify

distribution_metadata.name: n_lower_tail_quantiles
distribution_metadata.description: number of lower tail quantiles to include, up to 10^-n

distribution_metadata.name: n_upper_tail_quantiles
distribution_metadata.description: number of upper tail quantiles to include, up to 1 - 10^-n

distribution_metadata.name: custom_quantiles
distribution_metadata.description: comma-delimited list of custom quantiles

distribution_metadata.name: track_histogram
distribution_metadata.description: if true, dynamically track histogram counts

distribution_metadata.name: histogram_min
distribution_metadata.description: smallest bin value

distribution_metadata.name: histogram_max
distribution_metadata.description: largest bin value

distribution_metadata.name: left_inclusive
distribution_metadata.description: if true, bins are inclusive of their left values

distribution_metadata.name: count_outside_range
distribution_metadata.description: if true, all values outside range are counted, else classified as null

distribution_metadata.name: n_histogram_bins
distribution_metadata.description: number of evenly spaced histogram bins to use

distribution_metadata.name: custom_histogram_bins
distribution_metadata.description: comma-delimited list of custom histogram bins

distribution_metadata.name: track_cluster_estimate
distribution_metadata.description: if true, track distribution via clustered kernel density estimate

distribution_metadata.name: num_clusters
distribution_metadata.description: number of clusters to characterize; if null, inferred from distribution

distribution_metadata.name: bandwidth
distribution_metadata.description: cluster bandwidth; if null, inferred from distribution

distribution_metadata.name: kernel_type
distribution_metadata.description: kernel type, passed into scipy definition

distribution_metadata.name: track_parametric_estimate
distribution_metadata.description: track parametric estimate of distribution, using standard MLE optimization

distribution_metadata.name: parametric_family
distribution_metadata.description: parametric family name

random_variables.name: is_reserved
random_variables.description: if true, must be true for each model

random_variables.name: agg_func
random_variables.description: aggregation function used to generate feature

histograms.name: value_count
histograms.description: count of values in given bin

histograms.name: value_frequency
histograms.description: frequency of values in given bin

metric_defs.name: subset_name
metric_defs.description: subset name, as specified in config
